com.opera.core.systems.scope

Class AbstractService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opera.core.systems.scope.AbstractService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractEcmascriptService, ScopeConsoleLogger, ScopeCookieManager, ScopeCore, ScopeDesktopUtils, ScopeDesktopWindowManager, ScopeExec, ScopePrefs, ScopeSelftest, ScopeSystemInputManager, ScopeWindowManager

    public abstract class AbstractService
extends Object
implements Service
    All Scope services derive from this abstract base class for generic operations.
